document_data.name: Samuel Cymrych
document_data.mainbody: '''Samuel Cymrych''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid–7{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the uncle of his predecessor, High King [[Rowland Cymrych|Rowland the Boy King]]. His elder brother, [[Alec Cymrych I|Alec I]], had been Rowland's predecessor and his father, [[Embro Cymrych II|Embro II]], had been High King before that. Samuel's successor was his first son, [[Warren Cymrych II|Warren II]].
document_data.History:
Samuel assumed the throne of the High King in the {{YearlinkName|642}}, following the death of his young predecessor.

He ruled for nine years before he died of [[heartstop]] in the {{YearlinkName|651}}.
